item.title: Akademy 2017
item.description:
Last month, I attended KDE's annual conference, Akademy 2017. This year, it was held in Almeria, a small Andalusian city on the south-east coast of Spain.

The name of the conference is no misspelling, it's part of KDE's age old tradition of naming everything to do with KDE with a â€¦
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija
